page.title: 03CHILDREN OF STARCROSS
page.content: Most of the children have lived in {Starcross}all their lives.They mainly like the area because of the River Exe.Most of the children from {Starcross}live in two-storey houses.They wouldn't like to move from {Starcross}.The children take part in sports,activities,the reason why they take part is that they find sports very enjoyable.The nearest sports centre is in Dawlish,but they have two playgrounds.Some people admitted that they would like extra facilities like:football and rugby pitches and an adventure playground.The children thought that{Starcross}needed some more shops.The children's parents are employed in many different occupations.Many are outdoor jobs.Some work locally and others in Exeter.Some of the children live in{Dawlish}and {Kenton}and have to travel to school.
